alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Monroe (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:26PM EST until January 14 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow and blowing snow. Localized additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph will produce blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Monroe and Livingston counties. The greatest snow amounts will be across northern Livingston and western Monroe counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Sunday. The band of heavy lake effect snow will oscillate north and south numerous times during this event with conditions varying over time. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow covered and slippery road conditions at times. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
